thread.title: United Airlines passenger removed from plane after racist rant and bomb accusation - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: United Airlines passenger removed from plane after racist rant and bomb accusation - Yahoo7

author: News On February
title: United Airlines passenger removed from plane after racist rant and bomb accusation - Yahoo7
text:
Share United Airlines passenger removed from plane after racist rant and bomb accusation - Yahoo7 A passenger has been booted from a plane moments before takeoff after a racist rant where he reportedly asked a passenger if they were carrying a concealed bomb? Close ‘Goodbye racist’: Passenger booted from plane after asking man if he had a bomb UP NEXT 
Hearing the exchange, two nearby passengers secretly filmed the man and asked him what he was talking about? 
“All the illegals and s**t (need to get out),” the unruly passenger said in response. 
What he didn’t know was that his fellow passengers had instructed a nearby flight attendant to listen in on the conversation. The man's time on the plane was short-lived after his alleged comments about a bomb got him booted. Source: Newsflare Staff from United Airlines overheard his exchange with another passenger and promptly removed him from the Chicago blund flight. 
“Sir, you’re going to have to collect your belongings and come with me,” the United Airlines flight attendant said as he escorted the man from his seat. 
The woman filming the ordeal let fly at the man who would be doing the exact opposite. 
“A white supremacist is getting thrown off the plane,” she yelled. 'She got her a** whooped by 13-year-old': Cash me outside teen explains plane brawl 
“Goodby racist… This isn’t Trump’s America.” 
With his female companion also forced to collect her baggage and leave the aircraft, the man congratulated the pair on their sting. 
“Good job, that was pretty good guys,” he said. 
“I’ll be back, you’ll be gone.”
